# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-vim-1.0.0-RC1.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1057/org/openo/nfvo/vimadapter-deployment/1.0.0-RC1/vimadapter-deployment-1.0.0-RC1.zip && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-vim-1.0.0-RC1.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-vim-1.0.0-RC1.zip
EXPOSE 8481
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1057 > VERSION
